data.title: Top 10 Recording Studios in Florida: The Ultimate 2024 Guide
data.meta_description: This article shows the Top 10 Recording Studios Florida. Breaking-down studios across the state, Florida is home to great recording studios.
data.text:
While we think Bay Eight is worth the trip regardless of where you reside, we understand some of you may need a studio closer to home. If you’re in the Miami area, check out our article on the Top 5 Recording Studios in Miami. If you’re in the greater Florida area, this list of the top ten recording studios in our Sunshine State is for you.

1 – Bay Eight Recording Studios Miami in Miami, FL

Don’t fault us for starting the list with our own recording studio. We may be biased, but we’ve got the track record to prove why we’re the best. Bay Eight has now been in business for over 20 years, which is commendable in such a tumultuous industry. Our studio continues to attract some of the best artists in the world. Whether it’s Offset recording his album Father of 4, mixing for J.Balvin, or mastering Xantos’ tracks, our staff and studio can handle any project you throw at us. Furthermore, our facilities have been acoustically treated and house an array of analog outboard gear for professional artists. Below are some of the features that make Bay Eight the number-one studio in Florida.

SSL Room and Outboard Gear

First, the SSL Room is one of the most advanced recording, mixing, and mastering suites in all of Florida. With a 24-channel SSL AWS900 mixing console, the SSL room is what makes Bay Eight stand out from the rest of the recording studios on this list. This room also has the most analog gear in the studio, the SSL hybrid console helps grab the best of digital and analog sound. Another benefit of the SSL room is the custom flush-mounted Augsperger speakers.

The speakers were installed in 2021 when the SSL Room was going through its second renovation. Moreover, these custom speakers allow the room to have a massive sound not found in other studios. Covering a massive spectrum of frequencies, the custom Augspergers are the best in the world.

The next feature of the room is the analog gear within the studio. The studio features a variety of top-of-the-line compressors, preamps, mics, and an SSL 24-channel mixing console. With outboard gear like the TubeTech CL-1B and the Neve 1073, you are set for recording your song, paired with a Neumann U87.

We’ve established ourselves as one of the best recording studios in Florida and the proof is in our clientele. From analog gear to 24-channel mixing consoles, Bay Eight is sure to give you the best recording experience in Florida.

2 – Cleartrack Studios in Clearwater, FL

Located in Clearwater, Florida, the aptly named Cleartrack Studios contains five recording studios. The largest studio is Studio A, which contains an isolated recording booth and live room. Studio A’s Yamaha C6 piano makes it the perfect studio for recording your piano ballad with a live band. The room features an SSL 8000 G+ for recording gear with 56 channels. Additionally, Studio A contains Yamaha NS-10s and Dynaudio Bryston speakers. Cleartrack also contains four other smaller studios, each designed for a specific purpose, be it pre or post-production.

Many successful artists have recorded at Cleartrack Studios. Their far-reaching client list includes everyone from French Montana to Michael Bubble and Gucci Mane. Many of their famous clients have left positive testimonials, further reinforcing how Clearwater has managed to build such an excellent reputation.

3 – Ocean Avenue Studios in Port St. Lucie, FL

With a focus on live recording, Ocean Avenue has an Amek/Neve Recall 56 console, with Yamaha NS-10s and HS80M speakers. The Neve character has been a staple in rock music for years. Located in Port St. Lucie, FL, Ocean Avenue’s top-tier studio has drawn rock and metal legends like Iggy Pop, Korn, and Weezer. Of course, the studio is well-equipped for artists of all genres. Artists like Boyz II Men, David Guetta, and Nicky Romero have also recorded there. Ocean Avenue offers all of the in-studio services you may need including a full production package, songwriting services, as well as visual recording services.

4 – Plush Recording Studios in Winter Springs, FL

Plush Recording Studios is a recording studio based in Winter Springs, FL. Plush has been around for over two decades and boasts a client list that includes artists like Lauren Hill, Justin Bieber, and Migos. Also, Plush has an SSL E Channel mixing console and a variety of outboard gear. The studio contains multiple pieces of vintage gear previously used by some of the biggest names in music. Their collection even includes the speakers John Lennon used during his last recording session. Music excellence is built into every aspect of the studio.

In addition to having great speakers and a mixing console, the studio also has an excellent outboard rack. From API preamps to Lexicons, the studio can offer you a variety of sounds heard in pop music. Finally, Plush offers membership packages, which can be a money saver if you’re working on a large project.

5 – Grand Bay Recording Studios in Tampa, FL

Owned by husband and wife duo Alex and Lorena Romero, Grand Bay Recording Studios Inc. is a 5,700 square foot studio in East Tampa. Alex, who is also known as “Mixed by Lex” has served as an engineer on projects such as Larray’s “Canceled” and Iann Dior’s “Emotions.” Containing two recording rooms, Grand Bay is a modern designed studio with a 32 Origin SSL console in their A room. They offer services ranging from recording, mixing, and mastering. Grand Bay has earned RIAA-certified gold plaques for multiple projects, including for their work on Lil Yatchy’s single “Forever Young (Feat. Dilpo).” Their equipment list also includes microphones like the Neumann U-87 and the famed Sony C-800G.

6 – Suite 16 Recording Studio in Tampa, FL

Suite 16 Recording Studio features three control rooms, two vocal booths, a live room, a production room, and a green room. Since they are open 24 hours, it’s an excellent option for night owls and those that enjoy overnight sessions. Suite 16 hosts a number of events that cater to up-and-coming artists, including freestyle showcases with Tampa’s Lyrical Cafe. Artists like Tampa rapper T9ine have recorded in this studio, which also provides videographer and photographer services for those seeking a visual recording of their studio experience. Reviews rave about this studio’s excellent engineers and reasonable pricing.

7 – Skylab Recording Studio in Gainesville, FL

Established in the early 90s, Skylab Recording Studio is a full recording, mixing, and mastering studio based in Gainsville, FL. Skylab features a single recording studio for the basic needs of recording and production. They also have a dedicated mixing and mastering suite, which is a standout feature. Their recording studio boasts a GMS 5200 series mixing console modified with Neve Preamps. Skylab Recording Studio works with artists across a diverse range of genres, from techno to country and everything in between. Lastly, Skylab offers audio restoration, which is a unique service you’re unlikely to find at most recording studios.

8 – Endagered Wise Men in Jacksonville, FL

Endangered Wise Men is a recording studio in Jacksonville, FL. They attribute their name to the notion that creativity is an “endangered” idea they refuse to let die. Their facilities feature the largest live room in Jacksonville. So, they are ideal for recording live bands. Endangered Wise Men also has rehearsal spaces for performance practice. The studio offers a wide range of services including podcasting, ADR, music consultations, and photoshoots. Lastly, they even have sleeping accommodations available for visiting musicians. Owner and operator Rick Grice is a producer and engineer. In 2021 he launched a full-service record label under the Endangered Wise Men brand. If you’re in the Jacksonville area, this could be the one stop shop you’re looking for.

9 – Phat Planet in Orlando, FL

Phat Planet Studios is based out of Orlando, Florida. One of their studios features an API Legacy console. The studio also has an analog tape machine with digital converters to add warmth to your track and give you a vintage sound. Both of their two recording studios are artist geared. With guitars and amplifiers on-site, Phat Planet is especially ideal for rock or indie musicians who need a place to record their vocals and guitars. Furthermore, Phat Planet has recorded top-tier artists and producers. Artists like LL Cool J, Jill Scott, and One Direction are among their client list.

10 – Sound House Studios in Lakeland, FL

Sound House Recording Studios is based in Lakeland, Florida. The studio’s owner, Jonathan Gautier, is a producer and engineer who has worked with artists like Taylor Swift, Florence and the Machine, and Lorde. Sound House is a one-room recording studio with a focus on live recording. As a result, Sound House carries guitars, drums, and other live instruments.

Sound House has a hybrid digital and analog recording setup. The recording studio features vintage tape machines so you can add a vintage sound to your recording if desired. They are fit for any modern band. If you’re interested in recording here, note that Sound House Studios does not have conventional hours. Instead, they are by appointment only, so be sure to plan ahead.

Conclusion

The Sunshine state is home to some of the best artists in the world. As a result, we have many high quality recording studios that were established here to meet these artists’ needs. No matter what part of Florida you live in, we’re confident you can find a top-notch studio near you that will meet your needs. But if not, we are always happy to welcome you to Bay Eight Recording Studios Miami. We promise we’re worth the trek.
